local: whoami
Installing Tilt NodeJS dependencies…
 → matt
local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/fe.yaml"
 → apiVersion: apps/v1
 → kind: Deployment
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-fe
 →   labels:
 →     app: fe
 →     owner: matt
 → spec:
 →   selector:
 →     matchLabels:
 →       app: fe
 →       owner: matt
 →   template:
 →     metadata:
 →       labels:
 →         app: fe
 →         tier: web
 →         owner: matt
 →     spec:
 →       containers:
 →       - name: fe
 →         image: fe
 →         env:
 →         - name: TEMPLATE_DIR
 →           value: "/go/src/github.com/windmilleng/servantes/fe/web/templates"
 →         ports:
 →         - containerPort: 8080
 →         resources:
 →           requests:
 →             cpu: "10m"
 → ---
 → apiVersion: v1
 → kind: Service
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-fe
 →   labels:
 →     app: fe
 →     owner: matt
 → spec:
 →   type: LoadBalancer
 →   ports:
 →     - port: 8080
 →       targetPort: 8080
 →       protocol: TCP
 →   selector:
 →     app: fe
 →     owner: matt
 → ---
 → kind: Role
 → apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
 → metadata:
 →   name: pod-reader
 → rules:
 → - apiGroups: [""] # "" indicates the core API group
 →   resources: ["pods"]
 →   verbs: ["get", "watch", "list"]
 → ---
 → kind: RoleBinding
 → apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
 → metadata:
 →   name: read-pods
 → subjects:
 → - kind: User
 →   name: system:serviceaccount:default:default
 → roleRef:
 →   kind: Role
 →   name: pod-reader
 →   apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/vigoda.yaml"
 → apiVersion: apps/v1
 → kind: Deployment
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-vigoda
 →   labels:
 →     app: vigoda
 →     owner: matt
 → spec:
 →   selector:
 →     matchLabels:
 →       app: vigoda
 →       owner: varowne
 →   template:
 →     metadata:
 →       labels:
 →         app: vigoda
 →         tier: web
 →         owner: matt
 →     spec:
 →       containers:
 →       - name: vigoda
 →         image: vigoda
 →         command: ["/go/bin/vigoda"]
 →         env:
 →         - name: TEMPLATE_DIR
 →           value: "/go/src/github.com/windmilleng/servantes/vigoda/web/templates"
 →         ports:
 →         - containerPort: 8081
 →         resources:
 →           requests:
 →             cpu: "10m"
 →         readinessProbe:
 →           exec:
 →             command:
 →             - '/bin/sh'
 →             - '-c'
 →             - 'echo "everything is broken!" && true'
 →           initialDelaySeconds: 5
 →           periodSeconds: 5

local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/secrets.yaml"
 → apiVersion: apps/v1
 → kind: Deployment
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-secrets
 →   labels:
 →     app: secrets
 →     owner: matt
 → spec:
 →   selector:
 →     matchLabels:
 →       app: secrets
 →       owner: matt
 →   template:
 →     metadata:
 →       labels:
 →         app: secrets
 →         tier: web
 →         owner: matt
 →     spec:
 →       containers:
 →       - name: secrets
 →         image: secrets
 →         command: ["/go/bin/secrets"]
 →         env:
 →         - name: TEMPLATE_DIR
 →           value: "/go/src/github.com/windmilleng/servantes/secrets/web/templates"
 →         - name: THE_SECRET
 →           valueFrom:
 →             secretKeyRef:
 →               name: matt-servantes-stuff
 →               key: stuff
 →         ports:
 →         - containerPort: 8081
 →         resources:
 →           requests:
 →             cpu: "10m"
 → ---
 → apiVersion: v1
 → kind: Service
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-secrets
 →   labels:
 →     app: secrets
 →     owner: matt
 → spec:
 →   ports:
 →   - port: 80
 →     targetPort: 8081
 →     protocol: TCP
 →   selector:
 →     app: secrets
 →     owner: matt
 → ---
 → apiVersion: v1
 → kind: Secret
 → metadata:
 →   name: matt-servantes-stuff
 → type: Opaque
 → data:
 →   stuff: [redacted secret matt-servantes-stuff:stuff]
 →   things: [redacted secret matt-servantes-stuff:things]
local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/job.yaml"
 → apiVersion: batch/v1
 → kind: Job
 → metadata:
 →   name: echo-hi
 → spec:
 →   template:
 →     spec:
 →       containers:
 →       - name: echohi
 →         image: alpine
 →         command: ["echo",  "hi"]
 →       restartPolicy: Never
 →   backoffLimit: 4
 → 
local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/sleeper.yaml"

local: m4 -Dvarowner=matt "deploy/tick.yaml"
 → apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
 → kind: CronJob
 → metadata:
 →   name: tick
 → spec:
 →   schedule: "*/1 * * * *"
 →   startingDeadlineSeconds: 90
 →   jobTemplate:
 →     spec:
 →       template:
 →         spec:
 →           containers:
 →           - name: tick
 →             image: busybox
 →             args:
 →             - /bin/sh
 →             - -c
 →             - date; echo tick
 →           restartPolicy: OnFailure
